amendment.description: To provide funding for critical emergency structural repairs to the Capitol Complex utility tunnels.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3701 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3701 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S3683-3684; text: CR S3683) To provide funding for critical emergency structural repairs to the Capitol Complex utility tunnels.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3701 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3701 proposed by Senator Allard.
